Class LoadedDie

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Die>

    public class LoadedDie
extends Die
    Created to represent a loaded die This die can be rolled, looked at, and compared with another die
    Author:
    Troy

      LoadedDie()
